remarks: An isomorphism is a homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isohom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isohom.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isohom.i $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
isohom.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
isohom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
isohom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
isohom $p |- ( ph -> ( X I Y ) C_ ( X H Y ) ) $.
